name: Fate Escape 2
description:
A small sequel of my endless action game, Fate Escape. I wanted to use this project as an opportunity to practice adding upon an old idea as well as get used to making game art assets again, so please excuse the art. You play as a hero who must protect their village from further destruction for the rest of eternity.

Music: https://peritune.itch.io/battle-tracks-jrpg-battle-music-collection
